participant_1.background:
My family was the first to accept me for who I am, with my curly hair and snake.
i am allergic to apples yet still eat them.
i like to bike.
i own a mansion that i do not live in.
i am a retired school teacher.

participant_2.background:
I check in with my pup.
I return from the country, and my gym workout helps me get back into the rhythm of my city life.
i sing many songs.
i am a senior in high school.
I want to be in good shape for my cosplay at Comic Con, so I try to exercise every day.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
Hi! It's going good, thanks for asking!  I just got back from the country and I'm working out to get back into the rhythm of city life.  How is your day going?
That sounds like it's been a busy day!  My day is going pretty well, thanks for asking.  I'm just getting ready to go for a bike ride.
Oh, that sounds fun!  I love going for bike rides.  I'm actually a senior in high school and I'm trying to get in shape for my cosplay at Comic Con.  What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, go for bike rides, and spend time with my family.  I also like to watch movies and play video games.
Oh, that sounds like we have a lot in common!  I love to read, too, and I also like to go to the movies and play video games.  What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is "To Kill a Mockingbird" by Harper Lee.  It's a classic American novel that I think everyone should read.  What's your favorite book?
Oh, I love that book!  My favorite book is "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald.  It's another classic American novel that I think everyone should read.
That's a great book, too!  I'm glad we have so much in common.
Me too!  It's always nice to meet someone who has similar interests.
I agree!  Well, I'm going to go for my bike ride now.  It was nice talking to you!
You too!  Have a great time on your bike ride!
